MAIN_MESSAGE: The electricity supply to your premises may currently be affected by planned work.  You should have received a letter explaining this.  We hope to be able to restore your supplies by 04-NOV-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: Monitoring systems on our network have alerted us to an unexpected fault affecting a number of customers over a wide area. We apologise for the inconvenience caused, our emergency response teams have been notified and we expect your supply to be restored by 16:00
